metadata.title: CVE-2023-2727 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Users may be able to launch containers using images that are restricted byImagePolicyWebhook when using ephemeral containers. Kubernetes clusters areonly affected if the ImagePolicyWebhook admission plugin is used togetherwith ephemeral containers.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
